data.text: @DrMokgethi @GautengProvince @GautengHealth @GautengEMS @KwaraKekana @SamuelModiba So the same @GautengANC is crying fowl when @CityofJoburgZA doesn't want to employ those 130 employees.

@DrMokgethi @AldrinSampear @GautengProvince @GautengHealth @GautengEMS @KwaraKekana @SamuelModiba The R1,1bn is a once off payment for this year so itâ€™s safe to assume that if no more money is allocated for the next financial year, all COVID-19 contractors will lose their jobs?

@DrMokgethi @GautengProvince @GautengHealth @GautengEMS @KwaraKekana @SamuelModiba I fail to understand of how our government works... They complain about money but still there are contracts posts that are being advertised almost each and everyday... what's happening maybe if they can make us understand. Then how are they gonna fight unemployment?

@DrMokgethi @GautengProvince @GautengHealth @GautengEMS @KwaraKekana @SamuelModiba More signs of a FAILED STATE! Just like this @Eskom_SA.....we can't continue like this with so many OOPS! Statements. What's next? @CyrilRamaphosa kanti zikhiphani grootman?
